name: simple-tiling-gnome-plugin
description: Simple automatic tiling window manager for GNOME Shell using binary space partitioning

scripts.install: mkdir -p ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/simple-tiling@tubbe && cp *.js metadata.json stylesheet.css ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/simple-tiling@tubbe/ && cp -r schemas/ ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/simple-tiling@tubbe/ && glib-compile-schemas ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/simple-tiling@tubbe/schemas/
